Project

Visualizing Singapore Government Spending test page

DashboardR Shinydraft Jan 1, 2019

Insights into the spending pattern of each Ministry and Agency of Singapore Government

Project Overview

How do you make sense of billions in government spending? Singapore's government budget data is publicly available, but buried in dense spreadsheets. We built an interactive dashboard using R Shiny that transforms Singapore's complex budget data into clear, explorable visualizations.

Read the complete project [here](https://wiki.smu.edu.sg/18191is428g1/GeViz)
